manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Small Brown Computer Desk Small Computer Desk for Different Places This desk can be used as an office desk, study desk, dorm room computer desk, writing desk, used in office dorm, school,bedroom, and workspace.

Detail Waterproof Desktop Design * Desk is made of thick Particle board with scratch-resistant, anti-collision, and waterproof, protect home office desk surface from daily wear and tear. Sturdy&Durable Material * Heavy metal frame with an iron hook, you can use it as headphones hook or schoolbag hook, with adjustable leg pads to secure the stability, and ensure the desktop is level. Non-slip & anti-scratch protectors under the legs protect your floor from scratching and reducing noises when moving. Big Leg Space * Small computer desks, brown color, simple style, offer large leg spaces, fit the kids, teens, and even adults to use. * Brown desktop matches the black metal frame, with storage bag and Headphone hook(BOTH REMOVABLE ).

Im glad that I went with this desk because it was exactly what I was looking for. Its the perfect size and great quality. My boyfriend was able to put it together in about 20 minutes. Great buy! Desk is easy to build and really nice This desk was so easy to build, it’s recommended for two people but this chick built it in less than an hour. I did get confused simply because this was the first thing I’ve built myself but I laughed at my self and said let’s get a new perspective and turned it the other way and everything came together. You don’t need any other tools everything you need is in the packet included! I think a guy who is good with stuff like this could build it in 15 minutes lol it’s so easy! I’m so happy with myself if you can’t tell hahaha it fits perfectly in the spot I needed to fit it in too but I measured the area and literally bought this because it fit those dimensions. If you’re hesitant just get it because honestly you’re not going to find a better deal. I looked at thrift stores for a few weeks and yeah I had to put it together but it’s not heavy to move and such an easy build. It’s worth the money and I got it on sale too. Perfect sturdy desk for small spaces Easy to assemble. Nice and sturdy desk that exceeded my expectations. Perfecto No pensé q fuera taaan pequeño. Pero lo decía en la descripción. Muy lindo 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Desk! Quality!
reviews.reviewText: So I order a TON of stuff on Amazon. This is my absolute favorite product ever purchased. First, can't beat the price point. I was actually extremely hesitant to purchase this desk because I figured it would be "just ok". I was so wrong! It came nicely packaged. The box was beat up, but because the item was packaged so well...there was not a single blemish. It was super easy to put together. It's sturdy. And it is cute. It's the perfect size for what I needed (read the dimensions before buying...it is a smaller desk). Love it! Thank you for such a great quality product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to put together, price point is perfect and the quality is excellent. I brought this desk for my 10 year old and it’s sturdy and really cute she loves it and so do I. Can’t go wrong with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for teenagers and the price..
reviews.reviewText: My daughter is going to love it when she gets home.. She’s 10 and it’s perfect size for her and a full size chair. Easy to put together and very sturdy. Would definitely recommend for the price as well..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small but durable/cute
reviews.reviewText: This desk was super easy to assemble and came with all needed materials to put it together even an Allen wrench. Everything is as pictured and the desk is a little small so keep that in mind. If you are like me and have very little space in your room, this will work just fine and it is able to hold my two monitor setup perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely a great table for my laptop!!!
reviews.reviewText: What I loved was the fact it is compact/small. It’s great in my master bedroom where my husband and I purchased a new laptop. I purchased the white tabletop with a black legs. It’s very sturdy, Took only 20 minutes or less for my husband to put together. The price was great and I was surprised how nice the quality of the table is when we paid such a great price for it. I’m able to use this desk for my new laptop as well as my DVD/CD player and everything that we needed with room to spare. I love the black holder on the side of the table because it holds a lot inside it. You can store many things in it. It’s very roomy and keeps everything organized. Also I loved that it came with a holder for my headphones. It’s great that I am able to use my laptop with this nice table in a quiet area. So I can write my book. There is not one thing I can say that is negative about this table. I purchased a black ergonomic chair that slides in and as I said earlier the table is perfect size. My husband and I both love it so much we are going to purchase another one for our spare bedroom to use as an office for our second computer. It's a great buy and very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This desk looks great in my daughters roomIt was super easy to put together and sturdy.Desk also was delivered the day after I ordered it.The last deesk she had was made of pressed wood and fell apart fast.This one looks great and looks like it will last

reviews.reviewText: I liked the ease of assembly, the pouch on the side for extras, the efficient use of space, and nice clean look.No dislikes yet!

reviews.reviewText: Love this pretty desk with gold accents. Modern looking. My daughter is using it as a vanity and is a great size. Not too big! Great for small spaces
Love the colours and quality of this study desk. Just the right size. Very nice overall balance between design and sturdiness.
